title: Against filthy writing, and such like delighting
author: Brice, Thomas, d. 1570.
publisher: By Iohn Alde for Edmond Halley and are to be solde in Lumbard strete at the signe of the Egle,
notes: Verse - "What meane the rimes that run thus large in euery shop to sell?".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
